Visage

Alchemist Most Purchased Items

Items purchased by Alchemist the most that were in the players inventory at the end of the game.
Sample Size: 40,415 players who played Alchemist in the last 7 days

Alchemist K/D/A by Item

Average K/D/A of the top 15 items that were in the players inventory at the end of the game sorted by kills.
Sample Size: 40,415 players who played Alchemist in the last 7 days

Last Hits/Denies/Gold Per Min/Exp Per Min by Item

Average Last Hits/Denies/Gold Per Min/Exp Per Min of the top 15 items that were in the players inventory at the end of the game sorted by last hits.
Sample Size: 40,415 players who played Alchemist in the last 7 days

Alchemist Win Percentage by Item

Top 15 items with the highest win percentage that were in the players inventory at the end of the game. Items that have a total purchase count less then 3% of the most purchased item are left out. This prevents cases where a few wins with abstract items result in a 100% win rate for that item.
Sample Size: 40,415 players who played Alchemist in the last 7 days
